text: The 1981 African Women's Handball Championship was the fourth edition of the African Women's Handball Championship, held in Tunisia from 17 to 31 July 1981. It acted as the African qualifying tournament for the 1982 World Women's Handball Championship. ==Draw== {| class="wikitable" !width=195px|Group A !width=195px|Group B |- |valign=top| |valign=top| |} ==Preliminary round== ===Group A=== \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Knockout stage== ===Bracket=== Fifth place bracket ===Fifth place game=== ===Third place game=== ===Final=== ==Final ranking== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 1982 World Championship |} {| class="wikitable" !Rank !Team |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:gold medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|File:silver medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|File:bronze medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|4|| |- |align=center|5|| |- |align=center|6|| |- |align=center|7|| |} ==References== ==External links== *Results on todor66.com 1981 Women African Women's Handball Championship African Women's Handball Championship Category:1981 in Tunisian sport Category:1981 in African handball Category:Women's handball in Tunisia Category:July 1981 sports events in Africa
